body.name: Eonon R0020 Dashcam, Eonon HD 720P, Compatible with All Android Car Stereos, Applicable for GMA12S-U,UA12S-PLUS-U,E46A12S-U,VWA12S-U,E90A12S-U,GMA12,Q03SE,Q50SE,Q53SE,Q63SE,Q65SE,Q80SE Car Radio
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery on orders over $35 shipped by Amazon.
Delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 33 mins
features: 🚙【High-definition 720P Dashcam】Featuring a resolution of 1280×720, this dashcam allows you to capture all the critical details such as license plates, signposts etc. Never miss what matters!

🚙【Compatible with Android Head Units】Use it with your Android head unit to check the recording videos, monitor road conditions and so forth on the big screen of your head unit. Enjoy a smoother and more convenient experience!

🚙【Seamless Loop Recording】When the storage is full, the dashcam can ensure continuous recording by replacing the oldest videos with the newest videos. With loop recording, the dashcam will never miss a crucial incident.

🚙【More Storage for Recording Your Driving】You just need to insert a MicroSD card (not included) into the dashcam’s card slot and then you can use it to record and save more footage without occupying the memory of your Android head unit.
🚙【Easy to Install】Just connect the USB cable of the dashcam to the USB port of the Android head unit. The dashcam can automatically power on/off with your vehicle, the real plug and play.
🚙【Retain the Important Footage】You can choose to lock the important clips and protect them from being overwritten. Record and enshrine something interesting or amazing while driving.
🚙【Adjustable Angle】You can adjust the angle of the lens up and down to suit your car and record video at the best angle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy install and works awesome with Eonon Android head units
reviews.reviewText: I bought this with my Eonon GMA12S-U head unit. It installs extremely easy and the on screen monitoring, menu and configuration is very simple as well. The video quality is as good as any other dash cam I have owned, but I don't spend hundreds of dollars on them either. This unit will do the job very nicely and paired with the Eonon Android head unit, it is a must add on.Oh, and I tried a high quality Samsung 64GB SD Card in it and it would not recognize it. I guess the 32GB limit is a hard limit, but still, 32GB should be plenty of room for several hours of recording before it starts over writing the old footage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent video for the money
reviews.reviewText: Only gripe is that the speed is not recorded even thou it is on the Eonon display..must be a software glitch with Eonon..other than that the video is nice in the day and night..looks much better than 720P

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: Great price. It is good for capturing live footage. Captures the music playing in the background. Has a good steep angle view in my 2004 f250 to see well ahead.32gb max micro card limit isnt bad. It uses a push in, push -in- further to release memory card. I read a review that one person had to take the entire unit apart to retrieve their card. Probably didnt push the card in further enough to spring the card out. It is a cheap unit ($30 including a sandisk 100 speed card). Buy a card and only take it out if needed?Good quality in the unit and how it records. Apk is already loaded in the internal memory of the camera and you access it the way you would with an attached memory card to install it's app (called traffic cop I think)Only records 3 mins at a time. Should have option to record entire drive as one file, or max at 30 mins.Ties up a usb port, no other options, the data port on the radio. Glad the radio works with wireless android auto. It would be hard for me to give up the data wire to wired android auto in my worktruck if that was my only option.I drive to 10 places per day. The traffic is getting worse in my area, and so is the caliber of driver. I've seen people pass school busses stopped letting kids off. This should be helpful for the police to properly conclude what happened, as long as it survives a hard crash. No reason to think it wouldn't.

reviews.reviewText: Edit:Make sure it doesn't come unplugged and make you crazy!Quality is alright. Haven't had a use yet but am sure it will come in handy.

reviews.reviewText: Bought a older bmw and it was missing a radio- bought the system and it came with the dash cam and back up camera ! Absolutely love it !

reviews.reviewText: Seems to work as advertised, paired with 32M SD card for stowage and has been working well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install with the EONON head unit. Controls and functions are basic at best. Video quality is OK, but I have seem better, especially night vision.My biggest complaint is the on screen speed is only in KPH not selectable to MPH. Contacted support and they confirmed with the engineers.I don't access the videos often and have this to CMA as I drive a lot and there are too many idiots on the roads lately.

Got this as a free gift with the purchase of a car stereo , wasn't expecting much and almost wasn't going to bother installing but I did and the video quality is great and no lag , zero complaints from me

Really easy to install and set up. Mount it, run the cable, plug into USB port of your android unit (I'm using the Q50PRO), go into file manager, select USB device (the camera) and run the apk file preloaded in the camera and off you go!Would have liked to see a rear camera addition to this setup or somehow even utilize the reverse camera to record the rear end. Otherwise can't complain for the price.
